name: Charlotte Pudding
text: On Play DON!! -2: If your Leader has the (Big Mom Pirates) type and your opponent has 6 or more DON!! cards on their field, draw 2 cards. Then, play up to 1 (Big Mom Pirates) type Character with a power of 6000 to 8000 from your hand.

effect.text: If your Leader has the (Big Mom Pirates) type and your opponent has 6 or more DON!! cards on their field, draw 2 cards. Then, play up to 1 (Big Mom Pirates) type Character with a power of 6000 to 8000 from your hand.
